examples.example: 我买了一磅新鲜的水果，准备做一份美味的水果沙拉。

translate.english: I bought a pound of fresh fruits and am going to make a delicious fruit salad.

examples.example: 我用一磅面粉做了一个香喷喷的蛋糕。

translate.english: I made a fragrant cake with one pound of flour.

examples.example: 我称出了一磅咖啡豆，准备煮一壶香浓的咖啡。

translate.english: I weighed out one pound of coffee beans and prepared to make a pot of fragrant coffee.
